attributes.action: Grant a bank holiday for both St George’s day and St David’s day.
attributes.additional_details: The question should be reversed back to the Government - why shouldn’t we do it? Why shouldn’t we be allowed the privilege to celebrate our countries heritage and patronage through celebrating both Saints days as Scotland, Ireland and Northern Ireland do?
attributes.background: Grant a bank holiday for both St George’s day and St David’s day, which aligns bank holidays for Patron Saints with Scotland, Ireland and Northern Ireland.
